I am fully immersed in my role as a voyeuristic stalker. 

They think they're so private, so safe in their little worlds. But they leave traces, little breadcrumbs for someone like me to follow. Social media is a goldmine, a window into their souls. I can learn their routines, their habits, their secrets. A quick glance at their trash can tell me more than they'd ever want to reveal. And sometimes, just watching from a distance, blending into the shadows, is enough. Their lives are an open book to me. They just don't know it yet.
